website_summaries.verdict: If you want a TV with a decent screen size for a low price, this model doesn't have many bells and whistles but has a lot to offer in terms of value.
pros: Basic, affordable, and easy to set up and navigate
50-inch screen works well for most rooms without being too small or overpowering
Has updated motion refresh (MEMC 120) that can keep up with games and action-packed movies and sports
cons: Sound quality is OK but not fabulous
Colors are bright, but the resolution isn't 4K HD

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: You could always get a Samsung or Sony but I'm broke as hell and this is the next best thing
customer_reviews.author: Dewsain

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine more bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is phenomenal. Beautiful crisp clear picture with superb color rendition. Some years ago (8 - 10, maybe?), we bought our first flat screen TV, a 37" Sceptre for $1000. We've loved it, but decided it owed us nothing when a few things started going haywire. We just replaced the old one with this new 50" Sceptre, only this time it cost us $230. If there's a better TV deal out there, I couldn't find it, and believe me, I looked long and hard. We're totally happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzr Guy

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the bar area at the restaurant I work at as one of our Insignia TVs decided to very rapidly develop rows of dead pixels. Could not be happier with this purchase. The picture is very crisp and clear and has a very slim bezzle making it very sleek looking. Atop that, less than 300 with a 4-year warranty?!?! Would definitely replace all of our bar TVs if they were all like this one
customer_reviews.author: mnsp

customer_reviews.title: Great big TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: We originally got a defective TV, seller resent one immediately and was super easy to work with. You can also find this brand at walmart as well. It is great for the price. The picture is good , sounds great and we are really pleased with it and how well the seller worked with us for a new TV right off the bat. We have a warranty as well and I hope that as time passes they are just as easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: brittany trask

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this TV is great, except the sound, which is not terrible, it's crisp but not loud enough for the tv size, but after all it's not an 80 inch television, but you can attach speakers and make it as loud as you would like, I purposely didn't want a smart TV because I use a 4k firestick. I also didn't want a 4k TV because unless it's over 55 inches you would have to sit really close to tell the difference, so if you are looking for a 50 inch TV, this is the best buy you could get, I am a diligent consumer. This was a wise purchase with an unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary A Sleight

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: So far great TV for the price. Sound quality could be better (it's not horrible). But for the price point absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Citizen not Subject

customer_reviews.title: Damage, not all parts was with it.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, screen is all messed up, dark on 1 half, no Remote control, no screws for the legs, no manual.. I mean who sells this kind of product.? Why just why??
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You definitely get what you pay for. This TV has lines all across it, the light seems to be out in certain areas. I'm going to exchange it to see if I can get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Skilbred

customer_reviews.title: It's still working great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this about four months ago as my TV for my bedroom. I have DirecTV and an Xbox One, and they both look great on this television. It came in two days in perfect condition (I have Prime), and it hasn't lost one pixel or had anything else happen in four months. It's on about six hours a day. Some reviews complained about poor sound. It seems fine to me. It's loud and clear when at about 1/5 of the max volume. I've never turned it up higher. Good product. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Terrible TV Picture
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this TV but the price was too good to pass up. I wish I didn't purchase it. The picture is blurry and you can see lines in the screen. Returning ASAP and decided to purchase a Samsung. Now I have to remove it from the wall and drag it to a UPS store to return. Lesson learned. You get what you pay for! Amazon was great with return as always.
customer_reviews.author: brigitte biroscak

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I was nervous about the sound being a problem. Then it arrived (a week early) and I couldn't be happier. It's not too loud or too quiet. Color is crisp and bright. Very sharp image. It's a great TV at an amazing discount! Picture does not do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: SarahHaugen

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply built TV
customer_reviews.text: The volume is very low although I turned it all the way max. Picture quality is not good. Cheap price and cheaply built tv
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture, easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Picture was good, very easy to assemble, the tools were included and the directions clear. Sound wasn’t super loud, but was more than acceptable. This is not a “smart” tv, it takes some bit of work to get WiFi, etc on it, but can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: brenmiy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty quality TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great, no complaints. Picture quality is fine, 3 HDMI ports, RCA, aux jack, optical cable jack. Sound is alright, I use a sound bar though so can't comment on that too much. Not bad at all for $229 for a 50"
customer_reviews.author: Sethé

customer_reviews.title: Yes it's worth it the price is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Three sounds it's not great but most tvs need a sound bar anyway. The difference going from my40" to this one. Made a big difference!!!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Broken in six months
customer_reviews.text: After six months it just stopped working... YOu can hear the shows but can't see them.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Parker

customer_reviews.title: Decent chance you will get a faulty model
customer_reviews.text: Terrible picture. The settings reset when you turn it off and on, so you will be adjusting the contrast, color and brightness every time you turn it on. The menu is not intuitive and the audio is low quality. It is cheaply manufactured which is evident by the reviews. It looks like your about 25% likely to get a faulty model. Mine was obviously purchased and returned at some point. Thanks, Amazon. Awful deal. EDIT: Only 1 of 3 HDMI ports still works and its acting like it will go out any time. This TV is about to be a 50" brick. Feeling embarrassed for getting scammed.
customer_reviews.author: James Lamb

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat the price for this TV
customer_reviews.text: It's a terrific picture and the price was sure right. I paid over three times that much for another brand two or three years ago and that one finally broke down. It developed the nasty habit of shutting itself off once in a while so I thought it was time to spring for a new one. This isn't 4k but it's still a great picture and, as I said, for the price, you can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Howard H.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the television for under 9 months and the screen is no longer working with lines etc. Purchased on Amazon for Christmas. The TV only shows the left half of the picture. The right half of the screen is Black. I'm so disappointed. This company you are purchasing from has no warranty and will not help you at all. They don't deserve your money. I got it for my parents for Christmas and I'm sho embarrassed that it isn't working. I've never had this happen before. It's cheap for a reason. Customer service doesn't exisit.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: HDMI Port quit working almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: The bad reviews were pretty high on this one, but for the money took a chance. Rarely do I post a bad review, but this one needs to be done. The sound quality wasn't stellar, but a sound bar would have fixed. Picture was OK could have lived with that. But I do fire tv and OTA DVR so everything goes through the fire stick in the hdmi port. The HDMI port went out like the 2nd day. One day none of them would work. decided it wasn't worth the savings went for a toshiba fire tv addition for 90 bucks more!
customer_reviews.author: MWest

customer_reviews.title: Good tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this tv for a couple months now. Overall I’m happy with the quality for the price. It has good image resolution. It connects to my chrome stick so I can stream easily and I was able to get a cord to connect my retro video games. The only issue I have encountered so far is the remote glitches. Sometimes when I press the volume down button it will instead turn the sound up, and things of this nature that are glitches.
customer_reviews.author: MorningHaze

customer_reviews.title: This TV doesn't like light or being viewed from the side
customer_reviews.text: The TV hooked up and played with no problem. If viewed from head on the picture quality is great. The instant you move to the side the color just fades out. If you have a large room and seating is pretty much right in front of the TV you will be happy with it. If you view it from a slight side angle you won't be as satisfied. The darker the room the better the picture. I didn't notice this with my Samsung but it cost a lot more money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid value!!
customer_reviews.text: Our other tv but the dust. Was looking for a decent replacement withoit breaking the bank. This was a perfect choice for our bedroom and a great value. No issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: P.O.S
customer_reviews.text: Had the tv for one day. Was watching the new Aquaman and the tv screen started going crazy and now it has lines all over it... can only hear the sound of the movie... was so excited Lesson learned Don’t buy this tv!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roper

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping made me return it
customer_reviews.text: Only giving it one star because when it came the entire screen was smashed so I don’t actually know how the product works. Had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Christina V

customer_reviews.title: Great picture good value
customer_reviews.text: Great picture good value accidentally ordered 2 seller offered to refund money once 1st one arrived and saw quality decided to keep both and give extra one as a Christmas gift to son

customer_reviews.title: 2 months RIP
customer_reviews.text: I’m assuming UPS damaged this TV since it lasted 2 months. Thank god for manufacture warranty. Hell I should’ve went to Walmart since my cheap self was looking to save. Tv worked fine up until the blackout.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: TV not working after 5/6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This TV has went out. Contacted Amazon and it was over 30 day bought this TV in February of this YEAR so now I have NO
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding?  Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a steal. Got it in less than 3 days, it set up in minutes and everything about it (video quality, sound and add-ons) are PERFECT! No need to spend money on a high-priced TV. This one is totally amazing for the price. We're going to buy a second one for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: PR GUY

customer_reviews.title: Light weight :^) low energy stays very cold even after 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: Everything is a bit brighter than I expected but after thumbing through the picture settings and adjusting everything I had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Sent this Sceptre 50 inches Slim ATSC QAM MEMC 120 1080p LED HDTV to our son to mount outside for his back porch area. A friend of mine and myself went there to play golf for a week, spent all of our evenings outside doing the BBQ, cigar and spirits thing. The TV worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Hawgfan

customer_reviews.title: The best 50" 1080p LED  on the market !
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, quality picture and sound, well made product and very good price. Thanks SCEPTRE for the quality product !
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kale

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality control. unit arrived without feet. They sent the feet in a timely manner. Tech support was helpful. I could not get the tv to get any over the air programs from my roof atenna. Thr tech explained that the signal was not strong enough. All in all I am pleased with the unit
customer_reviews.author: Vincent M. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Nice tv to look at.
customer_reviews.text: Picture has green in it and the blackness won't take it out. Low sound
customer_reviews.author: Rash1234

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not that great. But the picture quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the roku tvs i have them in every room. They are affordable and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: sharon miz

customer_reviews.title: Great TV/Low Price
customer_reviews.text: I got this tv for my apartment during Black Friday weekend. It was on sale for $229.99 and I had a gift code for $100 off so it came out to be $150 or so after all taxes. Can't beat that price for a 50 inch tv. Maybe it's not a Samsung or an LG or any other top electronic brand but it does its job and that's what matters to me the most
customer_reviews.author: Sarmen Yarian

customer_reviews.title: Great price great TV
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. The TV works very well and accommodates the 3 HDMI requirements I have. It was delivered quickly but the box does show what it is so be careful if you have porch pirate problems in your area. I was lucky and happened to be home on lunch when it was delivered as it came earlier than projected
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Tritten

customer_reviews.title: Great pricing and picture
customer_reviews.text: This tv is great! Good picture, sound and price. When I purchase another tv for my bedroom I will buy this brand. If you have children I would make sure this tv is either mounted on the wall or have a stable place for it to sit as to not get knocked over.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: What a deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv some of the best money I ever spent and not a lot of it
customer_reviews.author: Scott buchanan

customer_reviews.title: For my pc, Vhs/DVD, games.
customer_reviews.text: 3 Hdmi, 1 headphones, 1 regular Antennae, audio in (reg. headphone size), 1Vga, 1usb, 1 video/Ypbpr, 1optical audio. Thickness, 5-6mm on edge, growing to 1", 1.5" further in. Lower 1/3 +2cm thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Name

customer_reviews.title: Sound sucks
customer_reviews.text: Great picture the only thing I dislike is the sound quality but if you buy a sound bar it shouldn’t be an issue
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: But why do they keep putting the inputs wayyyy in the back where they're impossible to reach?! Also, the feet are ALL the way on the ends so you better have a BIG table or stand to sit this on or plan on a wall mount! Excellent picture quality and very good audio!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Brock

customer_reviews.title: Might need a sound bar.
customer_reviews.text: I love these TVs I bought two of them. My only issue is the second one I bought doesn't have the same speaker quality but everything else is satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Capps

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Picture is not "the best" but, such a small difference to save thousands!
customer_reviews.author: John Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for my older parents...
customer_reviews.text: They loved it. Unfortunately, their TV stand was too small, so I bought them one of those too. Now the TV looks and works great for them and they made sure to tell me all about how great it is! So yeah, I'd buy it again if there were a need to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Koscak

customer_reviews.title: Best TV value around
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you cannot get any better than the Sceptre 50 inches 1080p LED TV X515BV-FSR (2018). The picture quality and the sound is good, completely adequate for our master bedroom. It's not a smart TV. No problem, I just purchased an Amazon Fire Stick on sale for it. I would definitely buy it again and I would recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul, Flower Mound, TX

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the price. Let's hope it last past 5 years at the least
customer_reviews.text: Out clients at Rumorz Kutz the Barbershop loves this as an upgrade. Eventhough its not a 4k tv, it is stillvery much worth the money! We connected speakers for the super bowl 2019, and it was superb!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Keo

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a quality 50 inch TV. What I received was a great TV for $229. Set up in under Five minutes. After a bit of tweaking, the picture quality is amazing. The sound is not top notch but not a deal breaker for me. Viewing angles don't quite match the "straight on" view but again, not a deal breaker. Great purchase fora 50 in 1080i LED TV for $229.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: these are great times indeed
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe what is produced no a days, and I just looked and the tv is cheaper today. Go man go keep up the good work
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Worked great til It didn't
customer_reviews.text: Loved the TV until it stopped working today. It worked great last night. If you get a good one the sound and visuals are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Living Simply

customer_reviews.title: Upset because it developed a defect within a month of use
customer_reviews.text: The TV was a great buy at first, everything looked great and it was a good value for the size. However, after about a month the TV spontaneously developed a defect in the top left of the screen (as shown in photo). Would not recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just awsome quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv.picture is clear from all angles.very easy to install.luked ir so much we buoghr a 65 inch
customer_reviews.author: Ron Snow

customer_reviews.title: No Internet service
customer_reviews.text: What I didn't like about the TV was the fact that it was not a smart TV and I couldn't program my internet service on it. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the size, and the sound quality is pretty good overall from the tv speakers. The only issue is that there's some minor distortion with the screen itself in a few spots, but otherwise it's alright.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for your money!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought this one over the more expensive tv. I have no complaints. Its basic, gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: TheyCallMeMom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Super great, can't tell any difference between this brand and one of the high end brands. No reason to waste money on an expensive tv when you can get this price for the same thing
customer_reviews.author: MCA

customer_reviews.title: Good, basic big TV. Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a bigger TV, but didn’t need all the high tech add-ons. We just wanted simple HD capability, and this set was perfect. Especially for the price!! Easy setup, good quality, and a great value. We’ve had it for a few months, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Genie Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Delivery Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied overall on all things with my purchase. Picture quality is exactly as described. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena E

customer_reviews.title: Great picture but TERRIBLE sound.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and size for the price but the volume is worse than an iPod. I'm not deaf and at max volume my wife and I can barely hear what's going on. Update. I bought this TV in July. It's April. I have dead pixels.
customer_reviews.author: santamaria capetanelis

customer_reviews.title: 2 Hr picture time
customer_reviews.text: The TV picture only worked for about 2 hours and then went black. Sound still work and the channels could still change. In the time it worked it looks nice, we only used it for over the air TV. The return process was easy and the seller refunded our money quickly. I would skip this product but work with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Albers

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is a great deal! It works great, picture is decent, and is the best value for a 55” you can get!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Alford

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality wasn't that great, but for the price, we can live with it. Nice tv and it works well for what we intended it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Check your box for all the parts
customer_reviews.text: So the TV came in a day before it was supposed to which is Kudos on them the TV looks great great quality for the price the only problem I had when receiving the TV was that it was missing its legs which I contacted the seller and a week later I got the legs so I rate them a 5-star for responding so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: great  is-----great!!
customer_reviews.text: came 1 day early--neighbor installed ---picture was good -----changed contrast slightly and was great. --- all for less than a smaller one cost. $209.00 on sale ---great great great..
customer_reviews.author: Ben  goodly

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, no driver
customer_reviews.text: My computer doesn't recognize it as a monitor but plays on it. For the cost no complaints
customer_reviews.author: erneste

customer_reviews.title: It's only 200....hard to loose at that price point....
customer_reviews.text: You can get better TV's for cheaper and you can get worse TV'S for more. Yet, when you combine the fact that it arrives in one to two days and right to your doorstep it suddenly becomes a ok deal. It's a perfect TV for a "guest" room TV....you dont want guest staying to long anyway....
customer_reviews.author: Bishop and Victoria Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love it🐤🐤🐤🐤
customer_reviews.text: Love it good quality and the price u can't beat
customer_reviews.author: mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent !
customer_reviews.text: Money WELL SPENT! Arrived in perfect condition, and works GREAT!! VERY happy I decided on this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Topher Holt

customer_reviews.title: Priced right for Quality TV
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price and nice tv. Just not fully a Smart TV with out add on for internet.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, sound intermittent
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, but sound starts cutting out when turned up halfway.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a gift my father seems really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Normand Bourque

customer_reviews.title: Defective and cant get help!!!
customer_reviews.text: Picture scrambles randomly from time to time. Amazon couldnt help me and I cant get a hold of manufacturer!! You get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for the price !
customer_reviews.text: Great tv, great price! Speaker not really loud but I have my sound bar connected and sounds great. !
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Stone

customer_reviews.title: Television signal...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor tv picture, if you don’t have it connected via HDMI cable...regular coxial with standard definition doesn't work....give you fuzzy picture because of the signal. Make sure that you have a hdmi cable box, instead of a DTA box. The tv steams movies fine and clear....but watches movies all day.
customer_reviews.author: Onenoirman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tv! Speakers are a little quiet so sound bar is needed if the tv will be in a bigger space. But it’s an awesome screen display. I have two of these !
customer_reviews.author: Alina Brannan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. It had been a month and no issues this far.
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, big, cheap, check it out
customer_reviews.text: Just had this for a day so far it looks pretty darn good I'll review it again in about a month after I've had it a while but it looks good for the price so far I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: great , great , great
customer_reviews.text: shipped fast, picture was clear and clean. set up was very easy... love this item.
customer_reviews.author: renard mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: Great price...Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great picture. Works great with Roku and antenna.
customer_reviews.author: LakeErieLady

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Picture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this tv. Been using it for 8-9 months now, and have not a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy C. Widjaja

customer_reviews.title: Too many issues!
customer_reviews.text: This product had an issue with the picture and the sound!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Need better sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is trash, but other than that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: StrangePeaches

customer_reviews.title: Genesis Paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Fed Ex totally screwed up delivery-was finally at my door 1wk later than delivery day stated TV worked for 3 months then tuner went out This tv is a piece of trash-beware
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mckinstry

customer_reviews.title: Satisfued
customer_reviews.text: Works great. You may find better specials in some stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Burns

customer_reviews.title: What's important to know is that you're getting a quality television set for very little money.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality the picture quality very very good. My only comment is that I can't pick up some of my local programming. But that's minor considering the Channel that I do have available on my satellite television.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert Simmons

customer_reviews.title: It's a TV
customer_reviews.text: Needed a TV. This one was priced affordably and works. Done! TV party tonight!
customer_reviews.author: GN

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Make sure your stand is long enough. Feels unsafe on legs. But us fine. Nice picture for price.
customer_reviews.author: cyan

customer_reviews.title: A fine TV at a very reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine TV. It is a replacement for my older smart TV at one-forth the cost. I added an Amazon TV Fire Stick and a Google Chromecast and I now have a fully functional smart TV. I am very satisfied with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This 50" television I bought was a excellent buy for the price, although I' am not the sound could be a little better, it' s has a great picture, it also got here quicker than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: It's decent
customer_reviews.text: Without a sound bar this TV is not worth it cuz it don't get very loud at all. Other than that it's OK for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this tv.... very nice picture.. would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: SH2019

customer_reviews.title: Good tv
customer_reviews.text: Good tv for the price sound quality could be better but it's decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I ignored the negative comments (like this one), and looked at the overall rating and thought "It'll be fine". It wasn't. No sound at all, and HDMI ports image went in and out. No good.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It's $150
customer_reviews.text: It's a $250 TV. Can't expect much. The color is horrible. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lee Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Very nice slim tv. Vibrant picture and great sound. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: S. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Very surprised with this purchase. I just needed anything for my livingroom so I decided to go cheap, the picture is just as good as my Samsung in the room. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for the price
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this tv for the price. I would order another one without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hain

customer_reviews.title: There is only two mounting screws on the back to accomodate a wall mount.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a big TV, and what a great deal! Very happy with this TV
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Had the tv for 3 months. Now the screen will not display anything and it smells like burning plastic.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn
